column1: text

It's worth one listen. The last 5 songs are the best. Started from the bottom shouldn't have been 
his opening song. Drake isn't a bad boy, and this album seems like a fraud, 
a little. Too Much is my fave track.

Excellent! Make no mistake, this is probably the best album of the year tied with J 
Cole. Every album he keeps proving his credibility. Yes he's no Nas, Common 
or Jay-Z. But you can always appreciate his stories, the pain the love the 
loss the bravado. Great replay value, unlike the trash that Kanye put out 
earlier this year.

Music to STUNT to. Other than the few lyrics set to past romances, seems Drake went with the 
"F@*£ you I'm rich now" version of drake, that is ignorant bliss, but its 
understood as he's rapping the life he knows. - Just the market is full of 
such lyrics, would've been nice to have more of a mixture between the woman 
and how they fit the new lifestyle, with the more witty version of Drake 
when he knew his audience would understand.

He's real. #NWTS A lot of different pieces to him rolled into this album. You get the loved 
up side, failed romamces, broken family, life lessons he's had to learn, 
and the tougher hiphop side of him all on the one album. Its not the same 
as Take Care cause it takes you to where he is as a person now. Drake will 
aswell be one of my favourite rappers. He's real. Don't expect him to 
sugarcoat anything out here.

Drizzy at his best I loved his last album. But this is much better! I can't get enough of 
Tuscan Leather and The Language

Moments of magic There are some great parts on this album. However the majority is average. 
Nothing like take care. Similar to yeezus in the sense that sometimes it 
feels like drake just chose complete abstract sounds to sing/rap over( not 
as bad as yeezus). Drake is fantastic a lyrical genius and the if your 
thinking about buying the album you have to weigh lyrical genius against 
abstract sounds. I am in no way a "true fan" of drake. Therefore I am 
unbiased.

IYRTITL mixtape has been out for a while but i still think this was his 
best album ever. Been a Drake listener/fan or whatever you want to call it 
since Take Care. So, my opinion is this: NWTS and TC were his best albums, 
but NWTS has that little extra. It is worth listening. All songs on this 
record are very good and catchy while on his last mixtape, there's only a 
few I really like. Can't wait for his next album. I'm curious if it will 
top this. -Take Care OVOXO
Good Love it.. even the song Worst Behaviour is soo dry, the rest is GREAT!

Amazing Drake captures emotions and energy like no other rapper. This album is on 
par with Kanyes Dark Twisted Fantasy

Great album but... One of the song "The Motion" is not in the deluxe album. Other than that

Fantastic compilation I happened across this while browsing, and as I listened to each track on 
this album I was surprised by how many of them I recognised and remembered, 
despite not being familiar with some of the song names. Theres hardly a bad 
one in the bunch. Well worth a purchase, especially at the price.

I've owned this CD for years and it's one of the first albums that I've 
repurchased - it's that good. If you're a casual Fleetwood Mac fan like I 
am, you'll really appreciate all the really good music on this album. It's 
got everything you'll want to hear, except "The Chain", which I highly 
recommend you download as a single to complete your collection. Happy 
listening!

One of the greatest groups... Thank-you. Always loved their music. What an artistic, musically gifted 
group of talent conjoined together. Unique & delightfully quirky...

Only giving this 2 stars because you can't listen without an Internet

one of the best albums i've heard in years! As soon as you hear her sing,

21 By Adele is record breaking album and has 4 hits and 3 of them are #1 on 
the billboard chart. The album received Adele 6 grammy nominations at the 
2012 grammys and Adele won all 6 grammys. The grammy nominations included 
"album of the year" and "Song & Record of the year" and "Best Pop Vocal 
album" etc. 21 debut at #1 on the billboard chart and was #1 for countless 
weeks. Adele suprisingly beat other major artist for the grammy icluding 
artist such as Katy Perry and Rihanna. As you can see , Adele is an amazing 
songwriter and vocalist.

ADELE "ADELE 21", her, debut album, for the world. "Rolling In The Deep", broke 
all existing, invisible barriers, and reached the core, of music, lovers' 
hearts. Bravely, Adele revealed her soul to us, baring, her innermost 
mysteries of the enigma of love, passion and the destruction, of the 
spirit, of two lovers, who had become one. Adele breached past the forces, 
protecting, the hallowed dwelling of beauty. Adele is the first to enter, 
since Janis Joplin.

This album has four songs with #1 single potential Even if you've been beaten to death with "Rolling in the Deep" or "Someone 
like you" more recently, you should know that Adele carries that quality 
throughout the entire album. "Set Fire to the Rain," "Turning Tables," and 
"One and Only" could easily climb today's pop dominated charts just as 
well. Adele's 21 is a real evolution from her 19 album. I'd strongly 
recommend the album

usahou I know this seems unfair and I really like his music, but I got the email

works at all but more on the Google Play email and how it appears. Now, I 
did not click on or go forward with this, so it might be that it charges 
all this stuff and then gives you a credit at the end which makes the cost 
zero. But, it doesn't say that so the comments do say STAY AwAY, AND THAT

something for free make it truly free.

Thank you for beautiful music!! For those skeptics about this being a scam, it really is NOT a scam. Yes, 
they do ask for credit card info or PayPal, but they never charge you. I 
download a lot of their free albums and never had problems. I've never been 
wrongfully charged for anything I didn't purchase by my own free will and 
authorization. This is a beautiful gift from google and Michael. Thank 
you!!

Christmas In a Wonderful Way Michael has always had a very unique take on Traditional music and this

Thanks for your beautiful free music, in the Christmas Spirit . I have always loved Michael Buble music and voice talent. Better than any

Thanks for free music! I haven't listened to it yet, but these are my favorite Christmas 
classics. I'm sure I'll love it as long as he can sing haha! For those 
worrying about whether or not it's free, the way Google play is set up you 
have to "buy" things. But the price is $0.00. You can put 1 cent on your 
account and be able to get this album. I've never entered my credit card 
info on Google play, only Google play cards. So stop being cheap and put 
some money on your accounts!

Thanks for the free albums google To all people complaining that they ask for your credit card info: this is 
done because you have to press buy to get the album but the price is zero.

Great album Reviews are supposed to be about the product not your opinion of the 
company, but in response...this is the 10th free album I've gotten from 
Google and I've never been charged for something I wasn't purchasing. Your 
credit card is requested for any "purchase". When you "buy" the album you 
get an email receipt for $0.00. Calm down. Every store keeps track of your 
information so if you're that terrified and susceptible to fear mongering 
go get some CASH and actually but the album for $10 in a physical store.

Great Holiday Album. I'm not much of a Bublé fan but this is a great holiday album to have 
especially if you're able to get it when it's free. It's a very easy 
Christmas album to listen and relax to. I read a few of the other 
reviews... if you're not familiar with Google play or are using it for the 
first time, of course you're required to give payment information for 
purchases like music and books even if they're free. That really isn't a 
big deal... don't bring those kinds of issues into the reviews.

Brilliant album Don't usually like christmas albums but I LOVE this album probably helps

Great Album and artist! Only a talented artist can make me love Christmas music. For those saying 
scam, you have to have a payment option attached to your Play account, even 
for free stuff. If you are worried about it, go pick up a pre-paid Visa/MC 
or use an empty PayPal. I have had an active Play account for years and 
have never received an unauthorized charge.

Its free, not a scam Thank you for the music!! To you people that can't understand how this 
works, let me clue you in. This and many other things on Google Play are

to your account. If you haven't set up your account, yes they do want 
credit card info for future purchases. This is the 3rd completely free 
album I've received. Quit being a bunch of Negative Nancys!!
